Name: Eden Cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Rich purple in colour with rose, vanilla, almond, citrus and gin.
History: Adapted from a recipe discovered in 2003 at Oxo Tower Bar, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Eden Cocktail contains 201 calories
